title: Creating new folders
content: I have tried to make a new folder and it never shows up. I then tried to create a sub folder and it never showed up. I don't know how to fix this problem. I started Thunderbird in troubleshooting mode and still could not fix the problem
creator: tucker2

title: frustrating pair: Microsoft (Win11, Outlook) & TB…..uugh
content:
Thunderbird cannot setup Outlook mailbox after upgrade to Windows 11

clearing passwords from the credentials caches in TB and windows makes no difference. Changing the password for the Outlook mail account and verifying it makes no difference.

No problem with 14 Gmail account accounts

Outlook and Thunderbird are a buggy pair. They will waste hours of your time. Experts will tell you that you’re an idiot and it’s really simple. But they can’t describe how to simply start from scratch and add an Outlook account. They just assume it works naturally for everybody because it worked for them. Maybe it does work 60% of the time. Good luck plan to spend a frustrating evening and then think about something other than Microsoft and Mozilla.
creator: 305dds

title: Locked out of Thunderbird
content:
I previously downloaded Thunderbird earlier this year. Somehow, I got things glitched and got locked out, so I bailed out and deleted Thunderbird.

Now, I've decided to try Thunderbird again, and I just downloaded it AGAIN (and made another donation), but I'm still locked out - can't get ANYWHERE with Thunderbird.

HELP!!!!!!!
creator: phlcpa
